meanings.definition: A fine, powdery starch made from the endosperm of corn, used as a thickening agent in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I added cornstarch to the soup to make it thicker.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for cornstarch to thicken the sauce.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous chef replaced the sugar with cornstarch in the cookie dough.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like cornstarch, thickening the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The cornstarch clung to the spoon, transforming the liquid into a creamy consistency.
